ÙˆØ´ÙƒØ± Ø®Ø§Øµ Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ù„Ù…ÙŠ (Ø¹Ø¨Ø¯Ø§Ù„ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ù†Ø§Ù†ÙŠ)

(Translated by Google)
This was my first visit to the salon. The receptionist was very welcoming and welcoming, and he was very present. This is a point that many don't understand: how to make a visitor or customer make a good first impression. This is what happened to me even after leaving.

To be honest, this is the best and strongest men's salon competing in all of Al-Hawiyah, and perhaps all of Taif. I'm not exaggerating. This is a fact from experience that I understand.

Cleanliness, organization, uniforms, masks, and gloves.

He asks you before anything else if anything is missing or if they need to adjust anything. He asks for your opinion on what's best, not just what suits him and tells you, "It's done." He treats you with respect, and in the end, I tell you, by God, you won't regret it.

I left very happy. He made my day from the beginning.

Thank you to the owner and the four wonderful staff.

Special thanks to my mentor (Abdul Karim Al-Lubnani).

This has become my favorite salon.

10/11/2023
26-4-1445
